Burst Mode.card_desc: [Weapon] Switch your rifle to Three-Shot-Burst mode, increasing your effective range and firing three 220-damage shots every 0.4s.

Cardio.card_desc: [Hustle] Heal for 300 per second while using Hustle.

Compensator.card_desc: [Iron Sights] Reduce your weapon recoil by {scale=20|20}% while using Iron Sights.

Fire in the Hole.card_desc: [Frag Grenade] Generate {scale=6|6} Ammo for each enemy hit with Frag Grenade.

Firing Stance.card_desc: [Iron Sights] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% while using Iron Sights.

Grenadier.card_desc: [Frag Grenade] Reduce the Cooldown of Frag Grenade by {scale=1|1}s for each enemy hit by it.

Guerrilla Warfare.card_desc: [Hustle] Reduce the Cooldown of Frag Grenade by {scale=0.2|0.2}s every 1s while Hustle is active.

Hit and Run.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=5|5}% for 4s after getting an Elimination or Killing Blow.

Hot Potato.card_desc: [Frag Grenade] Reduce the cook time of Frag Grenade by {scale=10|10}%.

On The Move.card_desc: [Frag Grenade] Gain {scale=8|8}% Movement Speed for 2s after using Frag Grenade.

Predator.card_desc: [Iron Sights] Gain {scale=8|8}% Lifesteal while using Iron Sights.

Reflexes.card_desc: [Iron Sights] Reduce the time it takes to bring up Iron Sights by {scale=15|15}%.

Run and Gun.card_desc: [Hustle] Regenerate {scale=2|2} Ammo every 1s while using Hustle.

Scramble.card_desc: [Hustle] Reduce damage taken by {scale=3|3}% while using Hustle.

Second Wind.card_desc: [Hustle] Increase your Movement Speed during Hustle by {scale=10|10}% for 1.5s after activating it.

Shrapnel.card_desc: [Frag Grenade] Increase the radius of Frag Grenade's explosion by 40%.

Speed Load.card_desc: [Weapon] Generate {scale=7|7} Ammo after getting a Killing Blow or Elimination.

Ausdauertraining.card_desc: [Hasten] Während Hasten wirst du pro Sekunde 300 LP geheilt.

Energieschub.card_desc: [Hasten] Erhöht das Lauftempo während Hasten nach Aktivierung 1,5s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Feuersto\u00df.card_desc: [Sturmgewehr] Aktiviert Feuerstoß für dein Sturmgewehr, wodurch dieses nun alle 0,4s dreischüssige Salven mit 220 Schaden pro Schuss abfeuert und auf Distanz effektiver ist.

Flakweste.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Granatenfeuer.card_desc: [Splittergranate] Für jeden mit Splittergranate getroffenen Gegner wird {scale=6|6} Munition erzeugt.

Grenadier.card_desc: [Splittergranate] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Splittergranate für jeden getroffenen Gegner um {scale=1|1}s.

Guerillakrieg.card_desc: [Hasten] Während Hasten reduziert sich die Abklingzeit von Splittergranate pro Sekunde um {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Hektik.card_desc: [Hasten] Während Hasten wird erlittener Schaden um {scale=3|3}% reduziert.

Kompensator.card_desc: [Kimme und Korn] Reduziert den Waffenrückstoß während Kimme und Korn um {scale=20|20}%.

Laufend Munition.card_desc: [Hasten] Während Hasten wird pro Sekunde {scale=2|2} Munition erzeugt.

Raubtier.card_desc: [Kimme und Korn] Gewährt während Kimme und Korn {scale=8|8}% Lebensraub.

Reflexe.card_desc: [Kimme und Korn] Kimme und Korn wird {scale=15|15}% schneller aktiviert.

Schnell und t\u00f6dlich.card_desc: [Splittergranate] Nach Verwendung von Splittergranate erhöht sich dein Lauftempo 2s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

Schrapnell.card_desc: [Splittergranate] Erhöht den Explosionsradius von Splittergranate um 40%.

Schussposition.card_desc: [Kimme und Korn] Erhöht dein Lauftempo während Kimme und Korn um {scale=10|10}%.

Spontane Z\u00fcndung.card_desc: [Splittergranate] Verkürzt die Zeit bis zur Explosion der Splittergranate um {scale=10|10}%.

Unfallflucht.card_desc: [Rüstung] Eliminierungen erhöhen dein Lauftempo 4s lang um {scale=5|5}%.

Compensateur.card_desc: [Mires métall.] Votre recul avec Mires métalliques est réduit de {scale=20|20}%.

D\u00e9lit de fuite.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination augmente votre vitesse de {scale=5|5}% pendant 4s.

En mouvement.card_desc: [Frag] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=8|8}% pendant 2s après l'activation de la Grenade à fragmentation.

Endurance.card_desc: [Course] Vous récupérez 300 PV par seconde pendant Course.

Feu nourri.card_desc: [Arme/Armure] Votre Fusil d'assaut tire des rafales de 3 projectiles de 220 dégâts toutes les 0,4s. En parallèle, sa portée augmente.

Grenade grenaille.card_desc: [Frag] Le rayon d'explosion de la Grenade à fragmentation augmente de 40%.

Grenadier.card_desc: [Frag] La Grenade à fragmentation se recharge {scale=1|1}s plus vite par ennemi touché.

Gu\u00e9rilla.card_desc: [Course] Le temps de recharge de la Grenade à fragmentation diminue de {scale=0.2|0.2}s chaque seconde pendant Course.

Kaboum.card_desc: [Frag] Vous regagnez {scale=6|6} munitions par ennemi touché avec la Grenade à fragmentation.

Patate chaude.card_desc: [Frag] Le délai avant l'explosion de la Grenade à fragmentation diminue de {scale=10|10}%.

Posture de tir.card_desc: [Mires métall.] Votre vitesse avec Mires métalliques augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Pr\u00e9cipitation.card_desc: [Course] Pendant Course, vous subissez {scale=3|3}% de dégâts en moins.

Pr\u00e9dateur.card_desc: [Mires métall.] Pendant Mires métalliques, vos tirs ont {scale=8|8}% de drain de vie supplémentaire.

R\u00e9flexes.card_desc: [Mires métall.] Le temps d'activation de Mires métalliques est réduit de {scale=15|15}%.

Second souffle.card_desc: [Course] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=10|10}% supplémentaires pendant 1,5s après l'activation de Course.

Tir-poursuite.card_desc: [Course] Pendant Course, vous regagnez {scale=2|2} munitions par seconde.

\u575a\u56fa\u5916\u5957.card_desc: [护甲] 最大生命值提高{scale=50|50}点

\u5c04\u51fb\u59ff\u6001.card_desc: [机械瞄准] 增加机械瞄准时的移动速度{scale=10|10}%

\u5c0f\u5fc3\u624b\u96f7.card_desc: [破片手雷] 破片手雷命中敌人将为你回复{scale=6|6}发弹药

\u5feb\u901f\u7784\u51c6.card_desc: [机械瞄准] 瞄准速度增加{scale=15|15}%

\u5feb\u901f\u88c5\u586b.card_desc: [武器] 击败敌人或助攻时可以回复{scale=6|6}发弹药

\u6025\u884c\u519b.card_desc: [破片手雷] 破片手雷引爆期间，移动速度增加{scale=15|15}%

\u63a0\u98df\u8005.card_desc: [机械瞄准] 机械瞄准命中敌人将暴露其位置，持续{scale=1|1}秒

\u63b7\u5f39\u5175.card_desc: [破片手雷] 增加破片手雷的爆炸范围40%，并提高200点伤害

\u673a\u52a8\u6218.card_desc: [冲刺] 冲刺状态下每秒回复{scale=2|2}发弹药

\u6e38\u51fb\u6218.card_desc: [冲刺] 使用冲刺后你的装填速度提高{scale=10|10}%，持续3秒

\u6e38\u51fb\u961f.card_desc: [冲刺] 冲刺期间每秒回复250点生命值

\u70eb\u624b\u5c71\u828b.card_desc: [破片手雷] 减少破片手雷的引爆时间{scale=10|10}%

\u7206\u7834\u4e13\u5bb6.card_desc: [破片手雷] 破片手雷每击中一个敌人，都能减少它的冷却时间{scale=1|1}秒

\u75be\u98ce\u6b65.card_desc: [冲刺] 冲刺激活后的1.5秒内，加速效果额外提高{scale=10|10}%

\u7a81\u51fb\u5175.card_desc: [武器] 非开镜状态下伤害提升30%

\u7d27\u6025\u95ea\u907f.card_desc: [冲刺] 冲刺期间受到的伤害降低{scale=5|5}%

\u8d85\u5927\u5f39\u5939.card_desc: [武器] 使你的弹药数量增加{scale=2|2}

\u98ce\u7b5d\u6218\u672f.card_desc: [护甲] 击败敌人时移动速度提高{scale=10|10}%，持续4秒

Barbed Shrapnel.card_desc: [Frag Grenade] Enemies hit with Frag Grenade are slowed by 10% for 2s.

Firing Stance.card_desc: [Iron Sights] Increase Movement Speed while using Iron Sights by 10%.

Grenadier.card_desc: [Frag Grenade] For every enemy player hit by Frag Grenade, reduce its cooldown by 1s.

Hot Potato.card_desc: [Frag Grenade] Reduce the cook time of Frag Grenade by 20%.

Long Reach.card_desc: [Armor] Health Drops within 8 feet are pulled towards you. Does not pull if your health is full.

Reflexes.card_desc: [Iron Sights] Bring up Iron Sights 20% faster.

Scramble.card_desc: [Hustle] Taking damage while using Hustle increases the Movement Speed bonus by 10% for 2s.

Second Wind.card_desc: [Hustle] Increase Hustle speed by 10% for 1.5 seconds after activation.

Ataque y huida.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumentas tu velocidad de movimiento un {scale=5|5}% durante 4s tras asestar un golpe de gracia o conseguir una eliminación.

Cardio.card_desc: [Apremio] Te curas 300 PS por segundo mientras usas Apremio.

Carga r\u00e1pida.card_desc: [Armas] Regeneras {scale=7|7} de munición tras conseguir un golpe de gracia o una eliminación.

Chaleco antibalas.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=50|50} PS.

Compensador.card_desc: [Miras de hierro] Se reduce el retroimpacto de tu arma un {scale=20|20}% mientras usas Miras de hierro.

Depredador.card_desc: [Miras de hierro] Obtienes un {scale=8|8}% de robo de vida mientras usas Miras de hierro.

Desbandada.card_desc: [Apremio] Se reduce el daño recibido un {scale=3|3}% de mientras usas Apremio.

Dinamismo.card_desc: [Apremio] Recuperas {scale=2|2} de munición durante 1s mientras usas Apremio.

En movimiento.card_desc: [Granada de fragmentación] Aumentas tu velocidad de movimiento un {scale=8|8}% durante 2s tras usar Granada de fragmentación.

Granadero.card_desc: [Granada de fragmentación] Se reduce la recarga de Granada de fragmentación en {scale=1|1} s por cada jugador enemigo que alcanzas.

Guerra de guerrillas.card_desc: [Apremio] Reduce la recarga de Granada de fragmentación en {scale=0.2|0.2}s cada 1s mientra está activa Apremio

Hoyo en llamas.card_desc: [Granada de fragmentación] Recuperas {scale=6|6} de munición por cada enemigo que alcances con Granada de fragmentación.

Metralla.card_desc: [Granada de fragmentación] El radio de explosión de Granada de fragmentación aumenta un 40%.

Modo r\u00e1faga.card_desc: [Arma] Tu rifle cambia al modo de ráfaga de tres disparos, lo que mejora el alcance efectivo y disparando tres disparos que infligen 220 PS de daño cada 0,4s.

Postura de tiro.card_desc: [Miras de hierro] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=10|10}% al usar Miras de hierro.

Reflejos.card_desc: [Miras de hierro] Se reduce el tiempo que lleva activar Miras de hierro un {scale=15|15}%.

Segundo aire.card_desc: [Apremio] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta durante Apremio un {scale=10|10}% durante 1,5s después de activarlo.

Situaci\u00f3n acuciante.card_desc: [Granada de fragmentación] Se reduce el tiempo de retención en mano de Granada de fragmentación un {scale=10|10}%.

Atirar e Correr.card_desc: [Apressado] Regenera {scale=2|2} de munição a cada 1s enquanto está usando Apressado.

Batata Quente.card_desc: [Granada Frag] Reduz o tempo de detonação da Granada Frag em {scale=10|10}%

Bater e Correr.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento em {scale=5|5}% por 4s após dar o disparo fatal ou conseguir uma eliminação.

Cartucho GG.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta em {scale=2|2} a sua munição máxima.

Colete R\u00edgido.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

Compensador.card_desc: [Mira de Ferro] Reduz em {scale=20|20}% o coice da arma enquanto usa a Mira de Ferro.

Detritos.card_desc: [Granada Frag] Aumenta a área de efeito da Granada Frag em 40%.

Em Movimento.card_desc: [Granada Frag] Ganha {scale=8|8}% mais velocidade de movimento por 2s após usar a Granada Frag.

Estender.card_desc: [Apressado] Reduz o dano recebido em {scale=3|3}% enquanto estiver usando Apressado.

Fogo no Pavio.card_desc: [Granada Frag] Gera {scale=6|6} de munição a cada inimigo atingido com a Granada Frag.

F\u00f4lego.card_desc: [Apressado] Cura 300 de vida por segundo enquanto usa Apressado.

Granadeiro.card_desc: [Granada Frag] Reduz o intervalo da Granada Frag em {scale=1|1}s para cada inimigo atingido por ela.

Modo Rajada.card_desc: [Arma] Troca seu rifle para um modo de três disparos de rajada, aumentando o alcance e efetividade e disparando três tiros de 220 de dano a cada 0,4s.

Pose de Tiro.card_desc: [Mira de Ferro] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento em {scale=10|10}% enquanto está usando a Mira de Ferro.

Predador.card_desc: [Mira de Ferro] Ganha {scale=8|8}% de roubo de vida ao usar a Mira de Ferro.

Recarga Veloz.card_desc: [Arma] Gera {scale=7|7}de munição após dar o golpe fatal ou conseguir uma eliminação.

Reflexos.card_desc: [Mira de Ferro] Reduz em {scale=15|15}% o tempo que leva para trazer a Mira de Ferro.

Revigorar.card_desc: [Apressado] Aumenta a velocidade de Apressado em {scale=10|10}% por 1,5s após a ativação.

T\u00e1ticas de Guerrilha.card_desc: [Apressado] Reduz o intervalo da Granada Frag em {scale=0.2|0.2}s a cada 1s que Apressado estiver ativo.

\u0411\u043e\u0440\u044c\u0431\u0430.card_desc: [Спешка] Во время действия Спешки ваш входящий урон снижается на {scale=3|3}%.

\u0411\u0440\u043e\u043d\u0435\u0436\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u0411\u044b\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Смертельные удары и устранения генерируют {scale=7|7} ед. боеприпасов.

\u0411\u044b\u0441\u0442\u0440\u044b\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Смертельные удары и устранения повышают скорость передвижения на {scale=5|5}% на 4 с.

\u0412 \u0434\u0432\u0438\u0436\u0435\u0.card_desc: [Осколочная граната] После использования Осколочной гранаты скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=8|8}% на 2 с.

\u0412\u0442\u043e\u0440\u043e\u0435 \u0.card_desc: [Спешка] После активации Спешки ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=10|10}% на 1,5 с.

\u0413\u0440\u0430\u043d\u0430\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Осколочная граната] Попадание по врагу гранатой генерирует {scale=6|6} ед. боеприпасов.
[Осколочная граната] Попадание по врагу Осколочной гранатой сокращает ее перезарядку на {scale=1|1} с.

\u041a\u0430\u0440\u0434\u0438\u043e.card_desc: [Спешка] Во время действия Спешки вы исцеляетесь на 300 ед. в секунду.

\u041c\u044f\u0447 \u043f\u043e \u043a\u.card_desc: [Осколочная граната] Время до взрыва Осколочной гранаты сокращается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u041e\u0433\u043d\u0435\u0432\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Механический прицел] Ваша скорость передвижения при использовании Механического прицела повышается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u041e\u0433\u0440\u043e\u043c\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваш максимальный боезапас повышается на {scale=2|2} ед.

\u041f\u0430\u0440\u0442\u0438\u0437\u04.card_desc: [Спешка] Во время действия Спешки перезарядка Осколочной гранаты сокращается на {scale=0.2|0.2} с. каждую секунду.

\u0420\u0435\u0433\u0443\u043b\u044f\u04.card_desc: [Механический прицел] Отдача при использовании Механического прицела снижается на {scale=20|20}%.

\u0420\u0435\u0444\u043b\u0435\u043a\u04.card_desc: [Механический прицел] Механический прицел устанавливается на {scale=15|15}% быстрее.

\u0421\u0442\u0440\u0435\u043b\u044c\u04.card_desc: [Спешка] Пока действует Спешка, вы восстанавливаете {scale=2|2} шт. боеприпасов каждую секунду.

\u0425\u0438\u0449\u043d\u0438\u043a.card_desc: [Механический прицел] При использовании Механического прицела вы получаете {scale=8|8}% вампиризма.

\u0428\u043a\u0432\u0430\u043b\u044c\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваша винтовка каждые 0,4 с. стреляет короткими очередями по 3 выстрела, наносящими по 220 ед. урона, при этом радиус поражения увеличивается.

\u0428\u0440\u0430\u043f\u043d\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Осколочная граната] Радиус взрыва Осколочной гранаты увеличивается на 40%.

Drapie\u017cnik.card_desc: [Celownik] Zapewnia {scale=8|8}% kradzieży życia podczas używania Celownika.

Drugi oddech.card_desc: [Krzątanina] Po aktywacji Krzątaniny zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 1,5 s.

Grenadier.card_desc: [Granat odłamkowy] Skraca czas odnowienia Granatu odłamkowego o {scale=1|1} s za każdego wrogiego gracza trafionego tą bronią.

Kamizelka kuloodporna.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Kompensator.card_desc: [Celownik] Zmniejsza odrzut broni podczas korzystania z Celownika o {scale=20|20}%.

Ogie\u0144 w jamie.card_desc: [Granat odłamkowy] Trafienie wroga Granatem odłamkowym wytwarza {scale=6|6} szt. amunicji.

Pal\u0105cy problem.card_desc: [Granat odłamkowy] Skraca czas „gotowania” Granatu odłamkowego o {scale=10|10}%.

Pozycja do strza\u0142u.card_desc: [Celownik] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu podczas używania Celownika o {scale=10|10}%.

Strzelanie w biegu.card_desc: [Krzątanina] Przywraca {scale=2|2} szt. amunicji co 1 s podczas korzystania z Krzątaniny.

Szamotanina.card_desc: [Krzątanina] Zmniejsza odnoszone obrażenia o {scale=3|3}% podczas korzystania z Krzątaniny.

Szrapnel.card_desc: [Granat odłamkowy] Zwiększa promień eksplozji Granatu odłamkowego o 40%.

Szybkie \u0142adowanie.card_desc: [Broń] Wytwarza {scale=7|7} szt. amunicji po zadaniu Zabójczego ciosu lub udanej eliminacji.

Trening wytrzyma\u0142o\u015bciowy.card_desc: [Krzątanina] Przywraca 300 PZ co 1 s podczas trwania Krzątaniny.

Tryb serii.card_desc: [Broń] Przestawia twój karabin w tryb strzelania potrójną serią, zwiększając zasięg efektywny oraz wystrzeliwując co 0,4 s trzy strzały zadające po 220 obrażeń każdy.

Uderz i uciekaj.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=5|5}% na 4 s po zadaniu Zabójczego ciosu lub udanej eliminacji.

W ruchu.card_desc: [Granat odłamkowy] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}% na 2 s po użyciu Granatu odłamkowego.

Wojna partyzancka.card_desc: [Krzątanina] Skraca czas odnowienia Granatu odłamkowego o {scale=0.2|0.2} s co 1 s, kiedy Krzątanina jest aktywna

Bomba Geliyor.card_desc: [El Bombası] El Bombası ile vurduğun her düşman için {scale=6|6} Cephane oluştur.

Bombaatar.card_desc: [El Bombası] El Bombası ile vurulan her düşman oyuncu için Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1}sn azalt.

Dengeleyici.card_desc: [Nişangâh] Nişangâh kullanırken silahının geri tepmesini %{scale=20|20} azalt.

Gerilla Sava\u015f\u0131.card_desc: [Koşuşturma] Koşuşturma etkinken her 1 saniyede El Bombası'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.2|0.2}sn azalt.

Hareket Halinde.card_desc: [El Bombası] El Bombası'nı kullandıktan sonra 2sn boyunca %{scale=8|8} Hareket Hızı kazan.

H\u0131zl\u0131 Y\u00fckleme.card_desc: [Silah] Bir Öldürücü Darbe veya Saf Dışı Bırakma yaptıktan sonra {scale=7|7} Cephane oluştur.

Ko\u015f ve Ate\u015f Et.card_desc: [Koşuşturma] Koşuşturma kullanırken her 1 saniyede {scale=2|2} Cephane oluştur.

Patlamak \u00dczere.card_desc: [El Bombası] El Bombası'nın fünye süresini %{scale=10|10} azalt.

\u015earapnel.card_desc: [El Bombası] El Bombası'nın patlama alanını %40 artır.

Seri At\u0131\u015f.card_desc: [Silah] Tüfeğini 3 atışlık Seri Moda alarak etkili menzilini artır ve her 0,4 saniyede 220 hasarlık üç mermi at.

Soluklan.card_desc: [Koşuşturma] Koşuşturma'yı etkinleştirdikten sonra Hareket Hızını 1,5sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} artır.

Vur ve Ka\u00e7.card_desc: [Zırh] Bir Öldürücü Darbe veya Saf Dışı Bırakma yaptıktan sonra Hareket Hızını 4sn boyunca %{scale=5|5} artır.
